description: A suppressor with silky smooth recoil and accuracy at the cost of speed.

name: AIM OP-V4
description: A high-precision, low-profile reflex sight.

name: Commando Foregrip
description: A heavier angled grip that provides superior recoil control for intense firefights.

name: 7MW Canted Laser
description: This high-powered 7mW laser is designed to be the only option needed when aiming. This laser features canted aiming. Blocks optics. Laser is visible to enemies. Beam: Green.

name: SZ Oscar-9
description: This SoloZero 4.8x optic offers high-tier target acquisition for mid to long-range fights as well as mini red dot for intimate engagements.

name: EXF Backdraft Grip
description: A weighty foregrip from Expedite Firearms. Increased hip-fire accuracy and kick control.

name: SZ Battle Optic
description: This battle-ready optic from SoloZero is guaranteed to take a beating and keep its zero.

name: Lacerta Compensator
description: Reduced vertical and horizontal recoil, this compensator keeps shots on target.

name: Hipshot L20
description: A 5mW laser attachment that improves hip fire accuracy and recoil control. Laser visible from the hip. Beam: Red.

name: Spiral v3.5 Flash Hider
description: Keeps flash concealed as well as assists with gun kick control.

name: SZ Holotherm
description: A breakthrough holo-thermal sight that employs body-recognition tech to outline enemies.

name: XTen RR-40
description: A silencer with a significant increase range and bullet velocity. Speed and stability decreased.

name: Bruen Sync Shot Grip
description: An accurate, ergonomic angled grip that provides stability and accuracy when firing from the hip.

name: Bruen Pendulum
description: Significant vertical recoil control and increased accuracy with a slight impact to handling.

name: TA HUL-Breach
description: A heavy breaching device that increases melee damage with a reduction in hip walking speed.

name: Schlager ULO-66 Laser
description: A laser device from Schlager that increases hip fire accuracy. Laser is active from the hip. Beam: Red.

name: FOX-202 Flash Hider
description: Helps to hid muzzle flash from assailants and improves recoil stabilization.

name: XRK Sandstorm
description: A ported compensator from XRK that vents gasses upward to reduce vertical recoil.

name: 1MW Quick Fire Laser
description: A small laser attachment that increases aim down sight speed. Laser visible when aiming. Beam: Blue.

name: DEMO Cleanshot 40
description: A hinged foregrip with decent hip-fire accuracy and recoil control without sacrificing speed.

name: Cronen Mini Pro
description: Get the edge in battle and find your targets fast. This Cronen red dot offers a near-perfect sight picture and unobstructed view.

name: Point-G3P 04
description: Improves accuracy, recoil control, and handling. Laser visible to enemies from the hip. Beam: Green.

name: DR582  Hybrid Sight
description: A holographic sight with flip-to-side 4.8x magnifer.

name: Bruen Warrior Grip
description: Take superior kick control and increased hip-fire accuracy into battle with this foregrip from Bruen.

name: 7.62 Incendiary
description: Incendiary rounds are slower, but deal high damage against vehicles with a low burn effect.

name: Angel-40 4.8x
description: XTEN engineers have designed this rugged holographic optic for all combat scenarios. Features a swappable 4.8x magnifer for distance shooting.

name: Dark KX50 Flash Hider
description: A muzzle device from Cronen that enhances recoil control and hides muzzle flash.

name: TA CG76
description: A balanced Tempus Armament muzzle device that reduces recoil at the cost of some stability.

name: EXF Relentless-40
description: A heavy silencer from Expedite Firearms with buttery smooth recoli.

name: Talon Sixteen
description: Silently take down your target with superior range and smoother recoil.

name: Luca Bandera Scope
description: A long-distance scope designed by Luca Optics. Variable 3.7-8x zoom.

name: Demo Firm Grip
description: A large, textured grip designed for excellent recoil mitigation and a steady aiming for fast target acquisiton.

name: Accu-Shot 5MW Laser
description: A bright laser that improves aiming speed and stability. Laser is visible to enemies when aiming. Beam: Green.

name: BVM-338
description: A large-caliber compensator that reduces both vertical and horizontal recoil.

name: FTAC Reaper
description: A Forge Tac suppressor with a significant increase to range and recoil smoothness. Substantial decrease to speed and mobility.

name: AP-390 Flash Hider
description: Conceal muzzle flash from enemies and control some recoil with this flash hider.

name: Cornerstone Bipod
description: Stabilize your weapon when mounted on horizontal surfaces or prone. Added weight slows down movement speed while aiming.

name: Cronen DM338
description: This compensator mitigates horizontal recoil but reduces aiming stability.

name: XTen Stable Shot
description: Deploy this bipod when prone or against a horizontal surface for a secure firing position. Weight and size decrease sprint speed.

name: 1MW Artemis Laser
description: Stabilize aiming and increase weapon accuracy with this small laser cylinder. Laser activates when aiming. Beam: Red.

name: XTen Gravedigger
description: A skeletonized foregrip designed for maneuverability and accurate hip-fire shots.

name: SZ Mini
description: A compact, low-profile red dot sight for rapid engagements without losing sight of the battlefield.

name: Corio RE-X Pro
description: An active duty reflex sight from Corio Tactical. Features an auto-illuminated reticle and a large lens.

name: SZ Recharge-DX
description: A sealed reflex with an integrated micvro panel and a large field of view.

name: Corio Enforcer Optic
description: A high-quality holographic sight from Corio Tactical. Provides a clean sight picture for rapid engagements.

name: SZ Aggressor-IR Optic
description: A 6.3x thermal optic from Solo Zero. Cutting-edge thermal technology and a lightweight design make this and ideal scope for any hunt.

name: FTAC Tiger Grip
description: Small and agile, this angled grip increased hip fire accuracy and recoil stability for quick engagements.

name: HEX-40 Grip
description: A comfortable foregrip that enhances hip fire control, reduces gun kick, and improves walking steadiness. Reduces some speed.

name: Broadhead-3DP
description: Bruen's 3D-printed Inconel supressor offers silky smooth recoil and accuracy at the cost of speed.

name: Kastov-Rama
description: A low-weight stock that enhances speed without relying on unnecessary frills and construction.

name: Lachmann S76 Factory Stock
description: A lightweight stock that provides better maneuverability.

name: LMK64 Grip
description: A smooth and adept grip designed for CQB situations.

name: FTAC FB20
description: A long and heavy barrel designed by Forge Tac. The extra length provides better accuracy but slows the weapon.

name: DEMO 501 Factory
description: A lighter, shorter M4 factory barrel that provides a speed and mobility increase.

name: Spetsnaz S10 Stock
description: A heavy stock that helps keep the rifle steady when moving and aiming.

name: Kastovia 406
description: The factory barrel for the Kastov 762, this longer barrel provides exceptional precision at longer ranges.

name: 22'' Factory Fourteen Barrel
description: The Factory barrel for the EBR-14. Longer and with a 1-12 twist rate, this barrel provides better precision at further distances.

name: Model 1957 Stock
description: An all-wood stock that offers a traditional look as well as added weight for better recoil control.

name: FTAC RTP-40 Stock
description: Forge Tac's answer to heavier rifles. This streamlined stock is built for faster action and aiming speed at the cost of some accuracy.

name: FSS Spider Grip
description: A fully textured grip from FSS that provides superior grip for reduced recoil.

name: XTen Black Kite
description: A monolithic core suppressor from XTen. Best-in-class recoil smoothness with a slight increase to range.
